'''Bret McKenzie''' is a New Zealand actor and musician, best known as half of the entertainment duo ''[[wikipedia:Flight of the Conchords|Flight of the Conchords]]''. He is the son of actor [[Peter McKenzie]].

McKenzie gathered a huge web following for his tiny role as a background character in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], later dubbed "[[Figwit]]". He portrayed [[Lindir]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]]. He also wrote and performed the song "[[Frodo, Don't Wear the Ring]]" with ''Flight of the Conchords''.

==Roles==
* [[2001]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'': [[Figwit]]
* [[2003]]: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'': Figwit (labelled as ''Aegnor, Elven escort'')
* [[2012]]: ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]]'': [[Lindir]]
